items.sentence: She walked as fast as she could to catch up with him.
She walked up to him and asked him what his name was.
She was looking forward to going to a movie with him.
This is a picture of Tom and I when we were students.
This is a picture of the ship that Tom and I were on.
This report is badly written and is full of mistakes.
The letters Tom wrote to Mary were returned unopened.
The owner of the store was killed during the robbery.
Tom wasn\'t able to do everything we asked him to do.
I can\'t help you because I don\'t understand French.
I doubt Tom can comprehend what we\'re talking about.
I\'m extremely disappointed in how things turned out.
Would you have come to visit me if I had invited you?
Would you like to come in for an interview next week?
Would you like to go for a drink or something to eat?
Would you like to see your wife lose a little weight?
Would you mind putting these back where you got them?
Would you mind telling me how you got into my office?
Tom\'s father gave him a sports car for his birthday.
I read the newspaper every day when I was in college.
